name: Defender Switch Axe I
description: A switch axe crafted especially to fight off calamity. Modified so that anybody can use it.

name: Champion Switch Axe
description: A fortified switch axe designed for Rampage defense. It responds to one's desire to protect.

name: Champion Switch Axe II
description: A fortified switch axe designed for Rampage defense. It responds to one's desire to protect.

name: Kamura Iron Axe I
description: A switch axe forged with impeccable Kamura technique, giving it its hi-tech specs.

name: Champion Switch Axe III
description: A fortified switch axe designed for Rampage defense. It responds to one's desire to protect.

name: Kamura Iron Axe II
description: A switch axe forged with impeccable Kamura technique, giving it its hi-tech specs.

name: Kamura Iron Axe III
description: A switch axe forged with impeccable Kamura technique, giving it its hi-tech specs.

name: Guardian Switch Axe

name: Kamura Iron Axe IV
description: A switch axe forged with impeccable Kamura technique, giving it its hi-tech specs.

name: Kamura Iron Axe V
description: A switch axe forged with impeccable Kamura technique, giving it its hi-tech specs.

name: Kamura Ninja Axe

description: Razes through forests in one sweep. Any craftsman would be proud to have made this.

name: Kamura Warrior Battleaxe+
description: Razes through forests in one sweep. Any craftsman would be proud to have made this.

name: Duke's Axe
description: A switch axe made from hard Malzeno materials. A single strike can end a hunt.

name: Fond Farewell II
description: An elegant axe left behind by a fair maiden. The sounds of its slices are ghastly.

name: Fracturing Falter
description: Under the looming blood moon this blade also turns red. Let the cruel hunt commence.

name: Parting Slice
description: An enhanced Fond Farewell. Its victims' cries echo as it welcomes a new dawn.

name: Parting Slice+
description: An enhanced Fond Farewell. Its victims' cries echo as it welcomes a new dawn.

name: Leave-Taker
description: I swear by thy axe that I shall not leave my love. Lock these words to memory, and keep them close.

name: Fond Farewell I
description: An elegant axe left behind by a fair maiden. The sounds of its slices are ghastly.

name: Leave-Taker+
description: I swear by thy axe that I shall not leave my love. Lock these words to memory, and keep them close.

name: Rath Flamesplitter II
description: An axe made from Rathalos materials. Facilitates igniting attacks.

name: Rath Flamesplitter III
description: An axe made from Rathalos materials. Facilitates igniting attacks.

name: High Rubillion
description: With sharpened claws, it awaits the moment to show its power. Ruin awaits the defiant.

name: Rath Blaze Splitter
description: The Rath Flame Splitter's improved form turns its user into the king of hellfire.

name: Wheel Axe I
description: As bright as a Bishaten's pelt, this switch axe is wheel-y powerful.

name: Wheel Axe II
description: As bright as a Bishaten's pelt, this switch axe is wheel-y powerful.

name: Axe of Wisdom

description: This axe frees you of your worries, by helping you take your fury out on your foes.

name: Axe of Righteousness+
description: This axe frees you of your worries, by helping you take your fury out on your foes.

name: Battleaxe of Kings

name: Axe of Glory+
description: A weapon used by monks in training. Comes into its own when facing true evil.

name: Axe of Virtue

description: An axe made from Delex parts. Its large fins enable it to severely mangle foes.

description: An enhanced Delex Sail with even bigger fins and even better slicing power.

name: Khezu Axe I

name: Khezu Axe II
description: An axe resembling a Khezu mouth, with perhaps just as many sharp teeth inside.

name: Khezu Cleaver+
description: An enhanced Khezu Axe. This powerful weapon is often called the "Khezu's Kiss."

name: Fullmark

name: Fullmark+
description: Once pierced by this blade, all that awaits is an inevitable death and infinite darkness.

name: Arzuros Jubilax

name: Amber Slash II
description: A lovely hunting axe made from the tri-color Barioth. Cold enough to freeze blood.

description: A lovely hunting axe made from the tri-color Barioth. Cold enough to freeze blood.

description: A renewed Amber Hoarfrost, icily beckoning death as crimson crystals fly.

description: This axe performs so well that it's starting to be mass-produced everywhere.

description: A wicked axe favored by the grimmest of reapers. Its dark flash tears apart the light.

description: Tear through the boundary between heaven and earth with this gleaming axe.

description: An ornate axe said to grant a wish if one can somehow collect a thousand of them.

name: Blossom Fall
description: Your wish was granted! This axe is as elegant as a cloud of petals in the breeze.

name: Grim Cat I
description: An axe depicting a cat with an eerie grin. Smiles even when its sharpness drops.

name: Grim Cat II
description: An axe depicting a cat with an eerie grin. Smiles even when its sharpness drops.

name: Full Bloom Axe
description: A blizzard of blooms carries the dreams of hunters to new tomorrows.

name: Grimmige Katze
description: The Grim Cat's improved form. Even if you try to destroy it, the cat merely grins.

name: Grimmige Katze+
description: The Grim Cat's improved form. Even if you try to destroy it, the cat merely grins.

name: Felyne Fatality
description: The enhanced version of the Grimmige Katze. Its indomitable spirit will never be broken.

name: Infernal Axe I
description: An axe based on a cruel and merciless demon. The fierce tip reaps its foes' souls.

name: Infernal Axe II
description: An axe based on a cruel and merciless demon. The fierce tip reaps its foes' souls.

name: Hellish Edge+
description: An enhanced Infernal Axe. It continues to take countless lives with merciless glee.

name: Hellish Edge
description: An enhanced Infernal Axe. It continues to take countless lives with merciless glee.

name: Sleepy Shellslice I
description: Axe that looks like a rugged shell. Just one mighty blow could make any foe faint.

name: Schale Batis
description: Can you hear the ocean? Drag your foes into the crashing waves of eternal slumber...

name: Schale Batis+
description: Can you hear the ocean? Drag your foes into the crashing waves of eternal slumber...

name: Sleepy Shellslice II
description: Axe that looks like a rugged shell. Just one mighty blow could make any foe faint.

name: Calamitous Axe
description: A switch axe harboring a dark power to control the grievance, yet inhabiting it.

name: Dreamcrusher
description: Its spiraling blade manifests a whirlpool of pain, swallowing all into a sea of eternal slumber.

name: Royal Order's Axe
description: A switch axe used by knights of the Order. Only those with ardent loyalty may wield it.

name: Royal Order's Axe+
description: A switch axe used by knights of the Order. Only those with ardent loyalty may wield it.

name: Antique Machina SA
description: A switch axe of emerald and gold furnished with a mechanism utilizing afflicted energy.

name: Rampage Slicer I
description: An axe that steadfastly cuts down foes and awaits the awakening of its true power.

name: Rampage Slicer II
description: An axe that steadfastly cuts down foes and awaits the awakening of its true power.

name: Rampage Slicer III
description: An axe that steadfastly cuts down foes and awaits the awakening of its true power.

name: Rampage Slicer IV
description: An axe that steadfastly cuts down foes and awaits the awakening of its true power.

name: Rampage Slicer V
description: An axe that steadfastly cuts down foes and awaits the awakening of its true power.

name: Rampage Slicer S
description: A battle-worn axe that will strike down foes until the day peace is finally won.
